mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT count(*) FROM review) AS review_count, (SELECT count(*) FROM notice) AS notice_count, (SELECT count(*) FROM users) AS users_count, (SELECT count(*) FROM tour) AS tour_count, (SELECT count(*) FROM schedule) AS schedule_count;
SELECT tour_id, avg(rating) AS avg_rating FROM review GROUP BY tour_id ORDER BY avg(review.rating) DESC LIMIT 8;
SELECT review_id FROM review ORDER BY like_count DESC LIMIT 8;

SELECT T.tour_id, T.name, TD.description, C.name AS city_name, TN.name AS town_name, T.background_image FROM tour T JOIN tour_detail TD ON T.tour_id = TD.tour_id JOIN city C ON T.city_code = C.city_code JOIN town TN ON T.town_code = TN.town_code AND T.city_code = TN.city_code WHERE T.tour_id = #{tourId};

SELECT R.review_id, R.content, R.created_at, T.name, RI.image, count(RL.user_id) AS like_count FROM review R JOIN tour T ON R.tour_id = T.tour_id LEFT JOIN review_images RI ON R.review_id = RI.review_id LEFT JOIN review_like RL ON R.review_id = RL.review_id WHERE R.review_id = #{reviewId} GROUP BY R.review_id, R.content, R.created_at, T.name, RI.image LIMIT 1;
